sqlMap.insert: insert into OE1TNDRFTMANAGE ( DRFT_SN , DRAFTER , DRFT_SJ , DRFT_CN , DRFT_DT , DRFT_STTUS_CODE , DRFT_OPINION , ATCH_FILE_ID , DELETE_YN , SYS_ID ) values ( #drftSn# , #drafter# , #drftSj# , #drftCn# , #drftDt# , '1' , #drftOpinion# , #atchFileId# , 'N' , #sysId# )

insert into OE1TNCONFMMANAGE ( DRFT_SN , CONFMER , SANCTN_TRGT_YN , CONFM_ORDR , CONFM_SE_CODE , CONFM_RESULT_CODE , CONFM_COMPT_YN , DRFT_DT , CONFM_DT , CONFM_OPINION , ATCH_FILE_ID , DELETE_YN ) values ( #drftSn# , #confmer# , #sanctnTrgtYn# , #confmOrdr# , #confmSeCode# , #confmResultCode# , #confmComptYn# , #drftDt# , #confmDt# , #confmOpinion# , #atchFileId# , #deleteYn# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT MBER_ID DRAFTER , MBER_NM DRAFTER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO WHERE MBER_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #mberNm#), '%') ORDER BY MBER_ID
sqlMap.update: UPDATE OE1TNDRFTMANAGE SET DRFT_SJ = #drftSj# , DRFT_CN = #drftCn# , DRFT_DT = #drftDt# , DRFT_STTUS_CODE = #drftSttusCode# , ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# , DRFT_OPINION = #drftOpinion# , DELETE_YN = #deleteYn# WHERE DRFT_SN = #drftSn# AND DRAFTER = #drafter#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.CONFMER , (A.CONFM_ORDR - 1) || ' | ' || (CASE A.CONFM_SE_CODE WHEN '1' THEN '기안' WHEN '2' THEN '결재' WHEN '3' THEN '합의' WHEN '4' THEN '통보' ELSE '' END) || ' | ' || B.MBER_NM COURS_DETAIL FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE A ,OE1TNUSERINFO B WHERE A.CONFMER = B.MBER_ID AND A.DRFT_SN = #drftSn# ORDER BY A.CONFM_ORDR

SELECT A.DRFT_SN , A.DRAFTER , C.MBER_NM , A.DRFT_SJ , A.DRFT_CN , A.DRFT_STTUS_CODE , (CASE A.DRFT_STTUS_CODE WHEN '1' THEN '결재중' WHEN '2' THEN '완결' WHEN '3' THEN '반려' WHEN '4' THEN '상신취소' ELSE '' END) DRFT_STTUS , A.DRFT_OPINION , A.DELETE_YN , DECODE(NVL(B.CONFM_DT, ''), '', '-', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.CONFM_DT ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) CONFM_DT FROM OE1TNDRFTMANAGE A ,OE1TNCONFMMANAGE B ,OE1TNUSERINFO C WHERE A.DRAFTER = #drafter# AND A.DRAFTER = B.CONFMER AND A.DRFT_SN = B.DRFT_SN AND A.DRAFTER = C.MBER_ID AND B.CONFM_SE_CODE = '1'
A.DRFT_SJ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
A.DRFT_CN LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
(A.DRFT_SJ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%') OR A.DRFT_CN LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%'))

SELECT count(*) totcnt FROM OE1TNDRFTMANAGE A ,OE1TNCONFMMANAGE B ,OE1TNUSERINFO C WHERE A.DRAFTER = #drafter# AND A.DRAFTER = B.CONFMER AND A.DRFT_SN = B.DRFT_SN AND A.DRAFTER = C.MBER_ID AND B.CONFM_SE_CODE = '1' AND A.DELETE_YN = 'N' /* 삭제여부 */
A.DRFT_SJ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
A.DRFT_CN LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')

SELECT A.DRFT_SN ,A.DRAFTER ,B.CONFM_ORDR ,C.MBER_NM ,A.DRFT_SJ ,A.DRFT_CN ,A.DRFT_STTUS_CODE , (CASE A.DRFT_STTUS_CODE WHEN '1' THEN '결재중' WHEN '2' THEN '완결' WHEN '3' THEN '반려' WHEN '4' THEN '상신취소' ELSE '' END) DRFT_STTUS ,A.DRFT_OPINION ,(SELECT B2.CONFM_OPINION FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE B2 WHERE B2.DRFT_SN = #drftSn# AND B2.CONFM_RESULT_CODE is not null) AS AFTER_OPINION ,DECODE(NVL((SELECT B2.CONFM_DT FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE B2 WHERE B2.DRFT_SN = B.DRFT_SN AND B2.CONFM_RESULT_CODE IS NOT NULL) , ''), '', '-', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE((SELECT B2.CONFM_DT FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE B2 WHERE B2.DRFT_SN = B.DRFT_SN AND B2.CONFM_RESULT_CODE IS NOT NULL) ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) AS AFTER_CONFM_DT ,A.ATCH_FILE_ID ,A.DELETE_YN ,D.CNT1 ,D.CNT2 ,D.CNT3 ,DECODE(NVL(A.DRFT_DT , ''), '', '-', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.DRFT_DT ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) DRFT_DT ,DECODE(NVL(B.CONFM_DT, ''), '', '-', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.CONFM_DT ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) CONFM_DT FROM OE1TNDRFTMANAGE A ,OE1TNCONFMMANAGE B
,OE1TNUSERINFO C ,(SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN CONFM_SE_CODE = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CONFM_RESULT_CODE = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CONFM_RESULT_CODE = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT3 FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE WHERE DRFT_SN = #drftSn# ) D
WHERE A.DRFT_SN = #drftSn# AND A.DRAFTER = B.CONFMER AND A.DRFT_SN = B.DRFT_SN AND A.DRAFTER = C.MBER_ID AND B.CONFM_SE_CODE = '1'

SELECT A.CONFMER ,B.MBER_NM ,A.CONFM_ORDR ,A.CONFM_SE_CODE , (CASE A.CONFM_SE_CODE WHEN '1' THEN (CASE C.DRFT_STTUS_CODE WHEN '4' THEN '상신취소' ELSE '기안' END) WHEN '2' THEN (CASE A.CONFM_RESULT_CODE WHEN '1' THEN '승인' WHEN '2' THEN '반려' ELSE '결재' END) WHEN '3' THEN '합의' WHEN '4' THEN '통보' ELSE '' END) CONFM_SE ,DECODE(NVL(A.DRFT_DT , ''), '', '-', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.DRFT_DT ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) DRFT_DT ,DECODE(NVL(A.CONFM_DT, ''), '', '-', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.CONFM_DT ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) CONFM_DT ,A.CONFM_OPINION FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE A ,OE1TNUSERINFO B ,OE1TNDRFTMANAGE C WHERE A.CONFMER = B.MBER_ID AND A.DRFT_SN = C.DRFT_SN AND A.DRFT_SN = #drftSn# ORDER BY A.CONFM_ORDR
UPDATE OE1TNDRFTMANAGE SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' FROM OE1TNDRFTMANAGE WHERE DRFT_SN=#drftSn# AND DRFT_STTUS_CODE = '1'

SELECT A.DRFT_SN , A.CONFM_ORDR , B.DRAFTER , C.MBER_NM , B.DRFT_SJ , B.DRFT_STTUS_CODE , (CASE B.DRFT_STTUS_CODE WHEN '1' THEN '결재중' WHEN '2' THEN '완결' WHEN '3' THEN '반려' WHEN '4' THEN '상신취소' ELSE '' END) DRFT_STTUS ,DECODE(NVL(D.DRFT_DT , ''), '', '-', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(D.DRFT_DT ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) CONFM_DT , B.DELETE_YN FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE A , OE1TNDRFTMANAGE B , OE1TNUSERINFO C , (SELECT DRFT_SN , MIN(DRFT_DT) DRFT_DT FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE GROUP BY DRFT_SN ) D WHERE A.CONFMER = #confmer# AND B.DRAFTER = C.MBER_ID AND A.DRFT_SN = B.DRFT_SN AND A.DRFT_SN = D.DRFT_SN AND A.SANCTN_TRGT_YN = 'Y' AND B.DRFT_STTUS_CODE <> '4'
B.DRFT_SJ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
B.DRFT_CN LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
(B.DRFT_SJ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%') OR B.DRFT_CN LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%'))

SELECT count(*) totcnt FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE A , OE1TNDRFTMANAGE B , OE1TNUSERINFO C , (SELECT DRFT_SN , MIN(DRFT_DT) DRFT_DT FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE GROUP BY DRFT_SN ) D WHERE A.CONFMER = #confmer# AND B.DRAFTER = C.MBER_ID AND A.DRFT_SN = B.DRFT_SN AND A.DRFT_SN = D.DRFT_SN AND A.SANCTN_TRGT_YN = 'Y' AND A.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND B.DRFT_STTUS_CODE <> '4'
B.DRFT_SJ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
B.DRFT_CN LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')

SELECT A.DRFT_SN ,A.DRAFTER ,C.MBER_NM ,A.DRFT_SJ ,A.DRFT_CN ,B.CONFM_ORDR ,A.DRFT_STTUS_CODE , (CASE A.DRFT_STTUS_CODE WHEN '1' THEN '결재중' WHEN '2' THEN '완결' WHEN '3' THEN '반려' WHEN '4' THEN '상신취소' ELSE '' END) DRFT_STTUS ,A.DRFT_OPINION ,(SELECT B2.CONFM_OPINION FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE B2 WHERE B2.DRFT_SN = #drftSn# AND B2.CONFM_RESULT_CODE IS NOT NULL) AS AFTER_OPINION ,DECODE(NVL((SELECT B2.CONFM_DT FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE B2 WHERE B2.DRFT_SN = B.DRFT_SN AND B2.CONFM_RESULT_CODE IS NOT NULL) , ''), '', '-', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE((SELECT B2.CONFM_DT FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE B2 WHERE B2.DRFT_SN = B.DRFT_SN AND B2.CONFM_RESULT_CODE IS NOT NULL) ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) AS AFTER_CONFM_DT ,A.ATCH_FILE_ID ,A.DELETE_YN ,D.CNT1 ,D.CNT2 ,D.CNT3 ,DECODE(NVL(A.DRFT_DT , ''), '', '-', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.DRFT_DT ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) DRFT_DT ,DECODE(NVL(B.CONFM_DT, ''), '', '-', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.CONFM_DT ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) CONFM_DT FROM OE1TNDRFTMANAGE A ,OE1TNCONFMMANAGE B ,OE1TNUSERINFO C ,(SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN CONFM_SE_CODE = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CONFM_RESULT_CODE = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CONFM_RESULT_CODE = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT3 FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE WHERE DRFT_SN = #drftSn# ) D WHERE A.DRFT_SN = #drftSn# AND B.CONFM_ORDR = #confmOrdr# AND A.DRFT_SN = B.DRFT_SN AND A.DRAFTER = C.MBER_ID AND B.CONFM_SE_CODE = '2'

SELECT A.DRFT_SN , A.CONFM_ORDR , B.DRAFTER , C.MBER_NM , B.DRFT_SJ , B.DRFT_STTUS_CODE , (CASE B.DRFT_STTUS_CODE WHEN '1' THEN '결재중' WHEN '2' THEN '완결' WHEN '3' THEN '반려' WHEN '4' THEN '상신취소' ELSE '' END) DRFT_STTUS ,DECODE(NVL(D.DRFT_DT , ''), '', '-', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(D.DRFT_DT ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) CONFM_DT ,B.DELETE_YN FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE A , OE1TNDRFTMANAGE B , OE1TNUSERINFO C , (SELECT DRFT_SN , MIN(DRFT_DT) DRFT_DT FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE GROUP BY DRFT_SN ) D WHERE A.CONFMER = #confmer# AND B.DRAFTER = C.MBER_ID AND A.DRFT_SN = B.DRFT_SN AND A.DRFT_SN = D.DRFT_SN AND A.CONFM_COMPT_YN = 'Y' AND A.CONFM_SE_CODE = '4' AND B.DRFT_STTUS_CODE = '2'
B.DRFT_SJ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')

B.DRFT_CN LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
(B.DRFT_SJ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%') OR B.DRFT_CN LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%'))

SELECT A.DRFT_SN ,A.DRAFTER ,B.CONFM_ORDR ,C.MBER_NM ,A.DRFT_SJ ,A.DRFT_CN ,A.DRFT_STTUS_CODE , (CASE A.DRFT_STTUS_CODE WHEN '1' THEN '결재중' WHEN '2' THEN '완결' WHEN '3' THEN '반려' WHEN '4' THEN '상신취소' ELSE '' END) DRFT_STTUS ,A.DRFT_OPINION ,(SELECT B2.CONFM_OPINION FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE B2 WHERE B2.DRFT_SN = #drftSn# AND B2.CONFM_RESULT_CODE IS NOT NULL) AS AFTER_OPINION ,(SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B2.CONFM_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE B2 WHERE B2.DRFT_SN = #drftSn# AND B2.CONFM_RESULT_CODE IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM = 1) AS AFTER_CONFM_DT ,A.ATCH_FILE_ID ,A.DELETE_YN ,D.CNT1 ,D.CNT2 ,D.CNT3 ,decode(nvl(A.DRFT_DT , ''), '', '-', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.DRFT_DT ,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) DRFT_DT ,decode(nvl(B.CONFM_DT, ''), '', '-', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.CONFM_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) CONFM_DT FROM OE1TNDRFTMANAGE A ,OE1TNCONFMMANAGE B ,OE1TNUSERINFO C ,(SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN CONFM_SE_CODE = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CONFM_RESULT_CODE = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CONFM_RESULT_CODE = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT3 FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE WHERE DRFT_SN = #drftSn# ) D WHERE A.DRFT_SN = #drftSn# AND A.DRFT_SN = B.DRFT_SN AND A.DRAFTER = C.MBER_ID AND B.CONFMER = #confmer# AND B.CONFM_SE_CODE = '4'

UPDATE OE1TNCONFMMANAGE SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE DRFT_SN = #drftSn# AND CONFM_ORDR = #confmOrdr#

SELECT CONFMER FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE WHERE DRFT_SN = #drftSn# AND CONFM_SE_CODE = '2' /* 결재 */ AND NVL(CONFM_RESULT_CODE, 0) NOT IN ('1', '2') AND CONFM_ORDR = (SELECT MIN(CONFM_ORDR) FROM OE1TNCONFMMANAGE WHERE DRFT_SN = #drftSn# AND CONFM_SE_CODE = '2' /* 결재 */ AND NVL(CONFM_RESULT_CODE, 0) NOT IN ('1', '2') )
